creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text:
I see quite a few of such warnings with 1.2RC4:

944959 2004-05-25 10:07:17,583 [PoolThread-4] WARN  org.apache.lenya.xml.XPSAsse
mbler.include():308  - java.io.FileNotFoundException: G:\LenyaRC4\build\lenya\we
bapp\lenya\pubs\docs\publication.xml (The system cannot find the file specified)
, currentInfo: G:\LenyaRC4\build\lenya\webapp\lenya\pubs\docs\publication.xml ,
sourceInfo: /G:/LenyaRC4/build/lenya/webapp/lenya/pubs/dummy.xml
Have not seen that in RC5
creator: roku@apache.org
A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text:
There is still one of these warnings in 1.2RC6. It can be provoked simply by 
visiting http://localhost:8888/index.html

390401 2004-05-30 13:11:16,281 [PoolThread-4] WARN  org.apache.lenya.xml.XPSAsse
mbler.include():308  - java.io.FileNotFoundException: G:\Lenya\build\lenya\webap
p\lenya\pubs\CVS\publication.xml (The system cannot find the file specified), cu
rrentInfo: G:\Lenya\build\lenya\webapp\lenya\pubs\CVS\publication.xml , sourceIn
fo: /G:/Lenya/build/lenya/webapp/lenya/pubs/dummy.xml
Which exact RC6 package have u used?
creator: roku@apache.org

text:
Confirmed. It seems the windows installer did not exclude CVS dir from pubs/*.
It is the only location where CVS dirs are around.

I will try to fix this in the build script of the windows installer or in the
ant build.
creator: roku@apache.org

text: Andreas, thanks for all ur reporting. I just commited a fix for this problem.
creator: roku@apache.org
